channel.title: Assassin day Ability {rework} Blinding Dagger
channel.description:
I posted this idea for a joke class https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-suggestion-the-tormental/35925/16
But I think that the assassin should get this day Ability to replace distract:
"Blinding Dagger" - blind a player for 10 seconds. They can not see anything that is said in the chat and they are not able to see or put up any votes (4 uses)
Note: he is still able to chat but can't see anything he says for the ten second period.
_Will you be able to see what everyone says after the 10 second blinding effect?_ - no, it works like a minor mystic mind warp. But you can see the votes after the effect wears off
Tell me what you think.
